article_title: Blood donation urged during pandemic to prevent shortage - Toronto Sun
article_description: Blood donation urged during pandemic to prevent shortage Toronto Sun  It s safe  Canadians urged to continue donating blood amid coronavirus spread CTV News Canadian Blood Services experiencing appointment cancellations   Kelowna News Castanet net Coronaviru
article_content: The COVID 19 pandemic doesn t mean healthy eligible people shouldn t donate blood Canadian Blood Services  CBS  which handles blood donations everywhere in the country but Quebec  wants everyone to know that it s still safe to donate during the coronavirus   1113 chars
